title: Learning Self-Efficacy Enhancement Program for Low-Academic Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Targeting professionals in medical, legal, or technical fields who understand complex job content but have low learning confidence due to educational background limitations.

learning_goals: Learners can report positive learning experiences with over 80% satisfaction by participating in three or more training sessions within a week.
Learners demonstrate a 20% or higher increase in learning self-efficacy scores through post-training self-assessment surveys.
Learners can develop plans to apply digital tool skills acquired during training to two or more real job situations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
